name: SlendyFreddy: Underworld
description:
Welcome to SlendyFreddy: Underworld. Where you need to collect five items:
Chica's cupcake
Bonnie's guitar
Foxy's Hook
Freddy's microphone
The pumpkin of the Halloween version of FNAF 4
There are 3 maps that can be accessed in the basement of the mansion, there are also 4 secret maps that you can access by collecting some items hidden by the mansion. Would you be able to find them?
